summary: My name is Vijay Chavda, and I’m a dedicated and passionate RPA Developer with over 3.6 years of experience in automating business processes using technologies like Automation Anywhere, UiPath, and Python. I’m a fast learner with a strong self-learning attitude and a deep interest in problem-solving and process optimization.

I enjoy working across the full stack of RPA development and web technologies, including Django, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I'm also skilled in creating data-driven insights with Power BI. I’m passionate about building automation that drives efficiency, saves time, and adds real business value.

I’m currently looking for new opportunities where I can apply my expertise, collaborate with innovative teams, and contribute to impactful automation solutions. If you're seeking someone with both technical skills and a problem-solving mindset — I’m ready to connect.

bullets: Designed & deployed 12+ bots using Automation Anywhere A360
Automated AP, reconciliation, and SAP processes saving ₹60 crore
Created reusable components and led stakeholder training sessions
Collaborated on dashboarding via Power BI and web tools
Created BRDs and supported migration from AA v11 to A360
Tested bots and improved performance via feedback loops
Automated invoice/data entry tasks, saving 20% manual effort

projects.title: Domestic Payment Processing
projects.overview: Successfully developed and deployed an end-to-end automated payment processing system that eliminated manual tasks, reduced errors, and ensured timely payments across various types, including auto, MSME, employee, insurance, and DEL payments.
contributions: Developed and deployed RPA bots using Automation Anywhere A360 for end-to-end payment automation.
Automated critical pre-checking rules such as vendor blocking, user validation, net debit checks, tax amount verification, and more.
Automated payment proposal generation, debit-credit adjustments, and error handling.
Monitored bot performance, identified exceptions, and updated error logs in the SQL Server database.
Collaborated with a 3-member team: 2 developers on the Django web app and 1 team member for Power BI dashboards for real-time reporting.
achievements: Achieved 6 FTE savings through successful automation of manual payment tasks.
Delivered the project successfully within 45 days, ensuring business continuity and compliance.
Reduced manual errors by 40% through automated validation rules.

projects.title: Duplicate Invoice Identification
projects.overview: Automated the identification of potential duplicate invoices within SAP data to prevent fraud before payment processing, saving significant costs and reducing manual hours.
contributions: Implemented an end-to-end solution for duplicate invoice identification using Ui Path.
Automated daily extraction of data from SAP ERP across 9 servers using transaction code FBL1N.
Consolidated data into Excel, added essential columns, and uploaded to MS SQL Server.
Applied advanced data cleansing and identified duplicates based on 13 unique combinations.
Generated files per combination and conducted same-day comparison with master-day data.
Eliminated manual errors and improved efficiency by automating a previously manual 2-hour process.
achievements: 60 CR saved in fraudulent payments by preventing potential duplicate invoices.
Reduced manual effort by automating the identification process, saving 2 hours daily.
Enhanced accuracy in invoice processing, preventing errors and fraud.

projects.title: Intercompany Reconciliation System (ICR Tool)
projects.overview: Developed and deployed a comprehensive Intercompany Reconciliation System to automate and streamline the reconciliation process across multiple entities, minimizing manual intervention and enhancing financial accuracy.
contributions: Designed an end-to-end reconciliation system with auto-matching (60%) and manual matching (40%).
Automated data extraction from SAP using Automation Anywhere (FBL1N and FBL5N) across 12 servers.
Developed a Django web portal with an HTML/CSS/JavaScript front end for manual reconciliation.
Built Power BI dashboards for real-time visibility of open items and reconciliation progress.
Implemented auto-reconciliation using 9 predefined matching rules, reducing manual time from 2-3 hours per day.
Automated generation of unique ICR numbers for new companies.
Ensured data consolidation and validation with SQL Server.
achievements: Delivered within a 6-month timeline, covering design, discovery, testing, and deployment.
Achieved a 4 FTE savings by automating reconciliation processes.
Received Spot Recognition Award for successful implementation.
Reduced reconciliation period from 7-8 days to near real-time and enhanced financial transparency.
